creditline: Bequest of John R. Van Derlip in memory of Ethel Morrison Van Derlip
description: Bowl, round, with incised pine trees around shoulder and body. Kidney shaped perforation on one shoulder, ovoid on other, for lifting. Long narrow perforations, flanked by small round perforations, around neck. The three round feet were cast with the bowl and not subsequently welded on.
title: Bowl
